data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Ceara at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Ceara's area.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Ceara.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, In Santos Santos drive forward through Marinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Charles is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 9, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Ceara's Charles is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 11, Marinho puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Diego Pituca to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Santos.
In the minute 13, Free kick Santos.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Santos's Marinho has run offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Ceara's Charles gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 18, Ceara are pushing forward but Vinicius Goes's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Santos to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cleber Bomfim.
Ceara surge into the attack at Urbano Caldeira but Vinicius Goes’s header is off-target.
In the minute 21, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Santos a goal kick.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Santos.
In the minute 24, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Ceara’s Cleber Bomfim is on his feet again at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Santos.
Goal kick for Ceara at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos are coming forward and Kaio Jorge gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 28, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Ceara a goal kick.
Attention is being given to Santos’s Marinho and play has been suspended briefly.
Marinho returns to the field for Santos after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 30, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos's Marinho misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Ceara at Urbano Caldeira.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Ceara throw-in in Santos's half.
Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 34, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Cleber Bomfim for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
In the minute 36, Santos push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Marinho gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Ceara defence.
Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Samuel Xavier levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 39, Throw-in high up the field for Ceara in Santos.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 42, Ceara needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Santos.
Vinicius Goes for Ceara drives towards goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Ceara.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Santos.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Santos.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Sandry Roberto with Vinicius Lourenco.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Santos to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Santos in the half of Ceara.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques waits before resuming play because Vinicius Goes for Ceara is still down.
In the minute 53, Vinicius Goes for Ceara is back on the field again.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Santos push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Diego Pituca gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ceara defence.
In the minute 55, Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 56, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Santos throw-in in Ceara's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 58, Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Vinicius Lima is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 61, Vinicius Lima, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Saulo is the substitute for Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
In the minute 63, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
Marinho (Santos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Santos.
Laercio Solda (Santos) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Ceara at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 69, In Santos Ceara attack through Vinicius Goes. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Cuca is making the team's second substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Arthur Gomes replacing Alison.
In the minute 70, Santos make their third substitution with Bruno Marques replacing Yeferson Soteldo.
Cleber Bomfim for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick Ceara.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 72, Diego Pituca (Santos) gets a yellow card.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Lucas Lourenco is on a sub for Kaio Jorge for Santos.
In the minute 76, Pedro Naressi is replacing Charles for the away team.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Felipe Vizeu is replacing Cleber Bomfim for Ceara at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 78, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Marinho of Santos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Santos to check on Tiago, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 83, Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Felipe Jonatan (Santos) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 88, Santos needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Ceara.
9 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Santos.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In Santos, Bruno Marques of Santos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Santos throw-in in Ceara's half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Ceara's area.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Ceara a goal kick.
Eduardo of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Santos have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Santos. The final score is 1-1.
Eduardo is on a sub for Samuel Xavier for Ceara.
Ceara make their fifth substitution with Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca replacing Fernando Sobral.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fifth substitution, with Jean Mota replacing Felipe Jonatan.
Saulo for Ceara has been booked by Rodolpho Toski Marques and receives a first yellow card.
